questions.question: Identify the correct tense in the sentence: 'By next year, she _____ her degree.'

Identify the part of speech of 'quickly' in: 'He runs quickly.'

options: The meal was cooked by the chef.
The meal is cooked by the chef.
The chef was cooking the meal.

questions.question: Choose the correct conjunction: 'He is poor _______ honest.'
Convert to indirect speech: 'She said, "I am tired."'
options: She said that she was tired.
She said that I am tired.

options: Hardly he arrived when it rained.
He hardly arrived when it rained.
